name: hugo_site
description: This is the repository from which the [Hugo](https://gohugo.io)-generated version of [www.brycewray.com](https://www.brycewray.com/) is built.

scripts.prod:host: npm run buildnew && mv public/posts/index.xml public/index-excerpts.xml && npm run pagefind
scripts.startsass: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean cleansass devsass --parallel dev:hugo devsass:*
scripts.buildsass: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean cleansass prodsass prod:hugo
scripts.testbuildsass: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean cleansass prodsass --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:sass
scripts.testbuildpfsass: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all buildsass pagefind --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:sass
scripts.startnew: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all installhugo clean cleannew postcsscli --parallel dev:hugo dev:postcss
scripts.buildnew: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all installhugo clean cleannew postcsscli prod:hugo
scripts.testbuildnew: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all installhugo clean cleannew --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:postcss
scripts.testbuildpfnew: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all installhugo buildnew pagefind --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:postcss

author: Bryce Wray
